{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard Procedure for Enclosed Space Entry","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Adverse effect of sea/weather on vessel movement","existingMeasures":"1. Do not carry out this job if vessel is not fairly steady - even mild rolling can make handling of weights at a height difficult.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Communication failure","existingMeasures":"One Person Supervising the entry relays the messages from tank to the bridge.
The frequency of communication checks between the Tank entry team and Deck Team supervising shall be agreed upon prior to entry.
Contingency plan to be discussed with the team shall be discussed in case of loss of communication.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Toxic / Flammable gases","existingMeasures":"Enclosed space been tested and found safe for entry. Representative cross-section of the atmosphere in the space, samples should be taken from several levels and through as many openings as possible.
Ventilation should be stopped for about 10 minutes before the pre-entry test are taken.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Insufficient Illumination / Unsafe access","existingMeasures":"Safe access and adequate illumination","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Hot Surface","existingMeasures":"PPE","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Malfunction of PGM","existingMeasures":"Entry to be made in teams of at least 2 members.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Corroded ladder","existingMeasures":"PMS","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Slip and trip hazards","existingMeasures":"PPE
Adequate illumination
Space ensured clean
One person at a time on the ladder","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Lack of adequate Ventilation","existingMeasures":"Effective ventilation maintained continuously during the entry period","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Leakage from adjacent tanks or pipelines","existingMeasures":"Fixed Gas detection system in operation (for ballast tanks),
Continuous monitoring of tank levels of adjacent spaces
PGM with personnel","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Rest hour non-compliance","existingMeasures":"1. Proper rest prior stating of the job.
2. STCW/ILO rest hour requirement to be complied.
3.If job is extended due to unforeseen dealy, job aborted and restarted after proper rest.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}]}
